channel.title: Xp rate glitch
channel.description: kk so i was setting my xp rates lower and now when you log in your hit points turn to 10/99 or 10/your hps really weird, yes i do know it's a problem in my client, nothing to do with the playerHandler. just woundering if i could get some POSITIVE feed back and not a flame/spam war like i did last time. thanks guys <3
